1.0.name: wordpress/icontact-infusionsoft-from-popup
1.0.description:
If you need paid support to get this plugin installed or to have a customized version of the plugin please send us an email to this address contact@cybernetikz.com.

By this plugins you can override the default look and feel (stylesheet/css) of iContact and InfusionSoft web form, also you can display them in your page/post as button using shortcode.

Key Feature

  • Override the default look and feel (stylesheet/css) of iContact and InfusionSoft web form
  • Display iContact and InfusionSoft web form by popup
  • Also you can add custom web from (your own HTML from code)
  • Use customize button image for iContact and InfusionSoft web form to display in page/post
  • Display the form in page/post using the shortcode
  • Support Wordpress multisite

Please visit our site http://www.cybernetikz.com/
